biotools.summary: BayesMix is a piece of computer software, a suite of R functions and C routines with a graphical user interface, which can be used as a tool for performing model-based inference for differential gene expression, using a non-parametric Bayesian mixture probability model for the distribution of gene intensities under different conditions.

bioschemas.name: BayesMix
bioschemas.summary: BayesMix is a piece of computer software, a suite of R functions and C routines with a graphical user interface, which can be used as a tool for performing model-based inference for differential gene expression, using a non-parametric Bayesian mixture probability model for the distribution of gene intensities under different conditions.
